repairedDockerfile:
FROM tleyden5iwx/open-ocr-2
ENV LC_ALL=C.UTF-8 \
    LANG=C.UTF-8

WORKDIR /home/

RUN set -eux \
    && apt-get update \
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3-pip python-dev build-essential \
    && apt install --no-install-recommends -y libsm6 libxext6 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY requirements.txt /tmp/requirements.txt

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r /tmp/requirements.txt

ADD . /home

CMD ["bash"]
